'I'm not sure if I like all these people\ncalling me sexy...'%K%P
After practice we'd gone to Kagura's cafe\nand continued checking the reactions to the video\non a tablet.%K%P
'I think it's good that everyone's liking it. \nAnd look, your rank's gone up, too!'%K%P
'Aw, you overtook me again...'%K%P
Today they'd be Shuri & Kagura (TBC).%K%P
'I'm impressed you're so comfortable in that outfit,\nKagura.'%K%P
'I'm used to it. It's all about confidence! \nIf you're serious about becoming a Divine Idol,\nyou'll need to get used to wearing stuff like this.'%K%P
Saying that, Kagura went back to work.%K%P
'Perhaps I should try getting\na job in a place like this?'%K%P
'And dance onstage like Kagura?'%K%P
'Well... That may be a little much for me.'%K%P
Shuri had finally approved her outfit,\nbut she evidently still had some issues.%K%P
'Perhaps we should put that aside for now.\nLet's respond to some more comments.'%K%P
We'd started replying to the video's comments.%K%P
There were some pretty personal questions mixed in,\nbut I think most fans were just excited to be able\nto talk to a real live Divine Idol.%K%P
'Great, another pervy question...'%K%P
'You know, you don't have to answer every\nsingle one. You can always ignore them,\nor pass them over to Kagura.'%K%P
'I could never do that. This question is from someone\nwho wants to know about me, it wouldn't be fair to\nmake Kagura answer it.'%K%P
'I guess so... You're doing a great job, though.'%K%P
'What? Where did that come from?\nYou're making me suspicious.'%K%P
'Sorry. Just do the best you can, alright?'%K%P
Shuri and Kagura really knew what they were doing.%K%P
Even though they were working as a duo,\neach of them was trying to learn from the other,\nthen use that experience to surpass them.%K%P
'I'll try, but are you sure\nthis is the best approach?'%K%P
'I don't want to end up being known just for\nmy looks. I'd much rather win fans through\nmy performances.'%K%P

'I know I have a long way to go before I'm worthy
of L☆SEVEN. But joining them is my dream.
I need to improve until I can stand on
equal footing with Sara and the others.'%K%P
'Please keep that in mind. That's what both Kagura\nand I are ultimately aiming for.'%K%P
Perhaps I'd been naive to think just increasing\nthe girls' popularity and raising their rank\nwould be enough.%K%P
All along Shuri had been thinking about the bigger\npicture, trying to plan for what would happen\nif she did pass the auditions and join L☆SEVEN.%K%P
'I understand. I'll do my best to support you two\nto the very end.'%K%P
'I know it won't be easy, but we're counting on you.'%K%P
That's when I knew I had to change.%K%P
I'd have to improve my own skills to properly\nsupport Shuri and Kagura as they grew as idols.%K%P
'Sorry to keep you waiting, Yamato!'%K%P
My conversation with Shuri had inspired me. \nAnd there was something I'd noticed since\nI was put in charge of filming.%K%P
My camera technique was way too amateurish. \nAnd my editing was nothing to write home about,\neither. I was holding Shuri and Kagura back.%K%P
There had even been some comments to that effect.%K%P
'Sorry to bother you with this.'%K%P
'Don't sweat it. Your practicing with the camera,\nright? If it'll benefit Kagura & Shuri (TBC),\nI'm glad to help out.'%K%P
The fact that she'd sneakily changed the name\ndidn't escape me, but under the circumstances\nI decided to let it go.%K%P
'Shouldn't you have asked Shuri, too? \nIt's a good opportunity, after all.'%K%P
'I did ask, but she turned me down. \nShe said it'd be too embarrassing for her.'%K%P
Shuri was getting used to the camera, but she\nrefused to be filmed for anything other than\nofficial footage.%K%P
'Geez, she'd actually enjoy it if\nshe just got more used to it.'%K%P
'You think so?'%K%P
'Totally. What's the use in being a Divine Idol\nif you don't like people watching you?'%K%P
We walked out from the side alley\nonto Akihabara's main street.%K%P
Somewhere in the mass of high rise\nbuildings we found a little photo studio.%K%P
'Okay, start filming whenever.'%K%P
'Meeeow.'%K%P
Kagura lay down on the sofa and mewed at me.%K%P
Somehow she managed to turn\na cute little gesture into dynamite.%K%P
'Hmm? What are you waiting for? Our time's going\nto run out if you stand around gawping too long.'%K%P
'R-right!'%K%P
We'd only rented the studio for an hour,\nI couldn't just stand around.%K%P
I switched on the camera and started recording.%K%P
'Don't just do full-body shots,\ntry zooming in on my most attractive features, too.'%K%P
Kagura's performances at the cafe had been recorded,\nso she already had a few pointers for me.%K%P
I'd also done some research of my own online,\nand picked up some tips that I wanted to try out.%K%P
'You're not embarrassed, are you? \nDon't be shy, that's what we're here for. Come on...'%K%P
She flashed her well proportioned thighs\nat me as if issuing a challenge.%K%P
I zoomed in and did my best to follow her movements.%K%P
'What's up? You sure are quiet today. \nAt least talk while you shoot.'%K%P
'Sorry, I don't think I can.'%K%P
I was concentrating so hard on getting the filming\nright and the subject matter wasn't making it\nany easier.%K%P
'Okay, fine. I'll just have to work extra hard at\nbeing a good model for you.'%K%P
'How's this?'%K%P
This time Kagura tried to accentuate her chest, too.%K%P
She posed in a way that really emphasized\nthe cleavage peeking out from inside her blouse.%K%P
'Y-you don't need to go that far...'%K%P
'It's not like you're seeing anything, is it?'%K%P
'Just feeling like I might see something\nmakes me more nervous.'%K%P
'All according to plan... Hee hee.'%K%P
It looked like I'd fallen into Kagura's trap.%K%P
Spurred on by my reaction,\nshe started to strike even more provocative poses.%K%P
Her uniform barely covered anything as it was,\nbut the way she was moving it was like I might\ncatch a glimpse of something sensual at any moment.%K%P
'What do you think? This sexy enough for you?'%K%P
'Wh-whatever, it's fine.'%K%P
'You're so cute, Yamato. \nPerhaps I should give you something extra special.'%K%P
'Hey, quit it, I really will see something\nat this rate.'%K%P
I couldn't take my eyes off her skirt.%K%P
Right now she was holding it down so it wouldn't\nget flipped up, but the way she did it was really\nenticing.%K%P
'You'll edit it out later if you do, right?'%K%P
'Of course.'%K%P
'If it's just during filming... I don't mind at all.'%K%P
No friggin way!\nWell, at least that's what I said inside my head.%K%P
When Kagura keeps trying to take it a little further\nsome things just end up being seen.%K%P
'Hey, did you see them just now?'%K%P
'Don't lie to me. You totally did.'%K%P
'But you're supposed to be able to see them, right? \nYou always wear that kind for your shows.'%K%P
'When I'm on stage, yeah, but not today.'%K%P
'These are the more private kind.'%K%P
The image of Kagura's private kind of underwear\nwas burned into my eyes.%K%P
'Phew, that sure was fun!'%K%P
Before I knew it, our hour was up.%K%P
It felt like we'd just finished doing something shady\nin our own secret room.%K%P
'So, what do you think?\nAre you getting more comfortable with the camera?'%K%P
'I think so, thanks to you.'%K%P
I felt emotionally exhausted now, though.%K%P
'Cool! Just let me know if you want to do this\nagain. I'll help you out anytime.'%K%P
Kagura waved happily and made a move to leave.%K%P
'Hold on! Let me walk you back.'%K%P
'No no, I'm fine. I can't wait to see the finished\nversion of this shoot!'%K%P
'And... Done!'%K%P
There was only about an hour's worth of footage,\nbut the editing took much longer.%K%P
I'd thought it would be simple to show off Kagura's\ncharms, but there were a lot of risque shots that\nhad to be cut.%K%P
'People'd think I'm some kind of pervert\nif I released these...'%K%P
So much ass, boobs and legs. \nNot to mention that 'private kind' of underwear.%K%P
'Well, I'll upload this then hit the hay. I'm beat.'%K%P
I finally finished editing out all the shots that\nwere too explicit. I'd double and triple checked,\nI was sure it was fine now.%K%P
Since this video only had Kagura in it,\nI uploaded it to her solo account.%K%P
'Whoa, that's fast!'%K%P
People were already commenting. \nWithin just a few minutes the video\nhad a ton of views.%K%P
I had a feeling the duo would be called\nKagura & Shuri (TBC) tomorrow.%K%P
